options.text: <a href="reader.html?chapter=epilogue_a", style="color:var(--background-light);">I'll choose the path of the police.
<a href="reader.html?chapter=epilogue_c", style="color:var(--background-light);">There are things I want to do in both the police and Shinjuku.

text:
It took him a moment to process the answer.
He slowly relaxed his shoulders and offered a faint smile.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I see. That's not a bad choice at all.
The bonds you found at Shinjuku are the real deal, no doubt about it.

name: Jagannath
text:
Whatever path you take, I'll support you with everything I've got.
Even if we stand in different places, you're still my precious junior.

options.text: Can't we still be buddies even if we're apart?
Maybe our paths will cross again someday.
To be honest, I'm still a little hesitant.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey now, don't go saying things that'll give me hope.
But— I do believe that life is full of surprises.

name: Jagannath
text:
Whatever form it takes, there will be a special 'continuation' for us.
That much I'm sure of, heheh. Isn't it worth looking forward to?

This wasn't just him acting tough, because he truly believed it—
A steady conviction and a light of hope shone in his 'eyes'.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well then, let's keep this exciting relationship going.
We'll both sprint down our own paths— and reach an amazing future.

Just as it seemed he would wrap his arm around [Player]'s shoulder,
he brought his face close and bared his teeth in a grin.
Their pure white breath melted together into the crisp, cold air.

Behind them, their footprints stretched back through the snow—
And, ahead of them, the fresh, untouched white extended forever.

Christmas Street Fight
～Ruthless Winter Festival Struggle!～
—END—
